Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.controller

Interface BasicGetController<T extends Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the entity that this interface handles
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccountController, BusController, PaymentController, StationController
@RestController public interface BasicGetController<T extends Serializable>
A generic interface for providing basic CRUD operations with RESTful endpoints.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default T
    getById(int id)
    Retrieves an entity by its ID.
    JsonTable<T>
    getJsonTable()
    Retrieves the JsonTable associated with the entity type.
    default List<T>
    getPage(int page, int pageSize)
    Retrieves a paginated list of entities.

  • Method Details

    • getJsonTable

      JsonTable<T> getJsonTable()
      Retrieves the JsonTable associated with the entity type.
      Returns:
      the JsonTable associated with the entity type

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") default T getById(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      the retrieved entity or null if not found

    • getPage

      @RequestMapping(value="/page", method=GET) default List<T> getPage(@RequestParam(value="page",defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(value="size",defaultValue="5") int pageSize)
      Retrieves a paginated list of entities.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (0-based)
      pageSize - the size of each page
      Returns:
      a list of entities for the specified page
